# OBJECT::SET_PICKUP_OBJECT_GLOW_OFFSET

## Summary
Sets an ambient or portable pickup object glow offset (usually ground height, 0.0f for something on the ground)

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** pickupID
* **FLOAT** offset
* **BOOL** set = true

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p1 is always -0.2 in scripts and p2 is always true in scripts.
